events.message: Customer has submitted a claim reporting an auto collision involving their vehicle on March 14th.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident based on vehicle collision details.
An agent experienced in auto accident claims has been assigned to handle the customer's case.
Customer received an official acknowledgment confirming the claim has been received and is under review.
The customer was asked to provide photos of vehicle damage, police report, and repair estimates.
Customer submitted all requested documentation including pictures, police report, and repair bills.
The investigation team has begun reviewing submitted evidence and police reports for claim validation.
Investigation has confirmed the accident circumstances match customer’s description; claim is valid.
A settlement offer has been prepared and sent to the customer for review and acceptance.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed appreciation for timely communication.
Claim approval has been granted following customer acceptance of the proposed settlement terms.
Settlement payment has been processed and issued to the customer’s designated bank account.
The claim has been successfully closed after payment issuance and case documentation completed.
All claim documents and correspondence have been archived in the system for future reference.
